/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant signs and advertisements that add a splash of color to the urban landscape. Cars and buses traverse the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the greenery of the trees lining the street. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
